title: Front Page
content: Welcome to *The Grizzly Cyber Sentinel*! Your go-to source for cybersecurity updates, events, and highlights from the CIAT Cybersecurity Club.

title: The President's Weekly Message
content: This week, we’re focusing on teamwork and knowledge sharing. Every member brings unique insight — let’s keep learning from each other!

title: Member Spotlight
content: Celebrate our members’ achievements! This week’s spotlight features students who earned new certifications and led successful club activities.

title: Security Spotlight
content: Our Security Spotlight explores trending cyber threats, defensive tactics, and member-led research findings from this month.

title: Coach's Corner
content: Your cybersecurity coach shares new training tips to prepare for real-world challenges and upcoming competitions.

title: Calendar of Events
content: View all scheduled meetings, workshops, and competitions on our events calendar.

title: From the Editor's Desk
content: Our editorial team reflects on recent activities, lessons learned, and member contributions to *The Grizzly Cyber Sentinel*.
